meanings.sent1: She levas the heavy box onto the shelf.
meanings.sent2: He always levas his hand in class to answer questions.
meanings.sent3: The magician levas the rabbit out of the hat with a flourish.
meanings.sent4: The crane levas the steel beams effortlessly into place.
meanings.sent5: The superhero levas the car to rescue the trapped kitten.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Lithuania
meanings.sent1: In Lithuania, they use levas to buy goods.
meanings.sent2: The shopkeeper accepted payment in levas for the souvenir.
meanings.sent3: The levas jingled in his pocket as he walked down the street.
meanings.sent4: She saved up all her levas for a special vacation.
meanings.sent5: The traveler exchanged euros for levas at the airport.

meanings.definition: The plural form of leva, the currency of Bulgaria
meanings.sent1: They counted the levas they received as payment.
meanings.sent2: The levas were stacked neatly on the table.
meanings.sent3: The levas in the wallet made it bulge uncomfortably.
meanings.sent4: She dreamt of swimming in a pool of levas.
meanings.sent5: The market was bustling with vendors accepting levas.
